> As soon as Ravenchief was free, he took to the skies, flying ba=
ckward into the air and firing with his blast pistol, but missing each time=
.  However Trelos was now focused on his new prey.  Depthcharge ran for cov=
er as the volley of shots whizzed past him, several striking him in the rig=
ht arm.
>
> Suddenly amid the pandemonium, Ravenchief heard some not-so-fri=
endly sounds.  Even from several stories up in the air he couldn't see anyt=
hing.
>
> "Depthcharge!" he shouted into his radio. "I have a really bad fe=
eling about this."
>
> Depthcharge emerged from his hiding spot fired a few=
 covering shots at Trelos as he tried to slowly retreat.  Before he could m=
ake it to cover, he was struck several times in the back.
>
> "It's like he=
's toying with us..." said Depthcharge.  "Cover me!  I need to put some dis=
tance between us."
>

=93GRRRRRRUUOORRR=94 Something akin to a growl and a =
low grumble
reverberated through the buildings, echoing strangely, seeming =
to come
from almost everywhere. It was as if the conflict between Ravenchie=
f,
Depthcharge and Trelos had awoken something primal within the creature
t=
hat stalked the shadows.

It continued to move near silently around the bat=
tle, dark optics
watched one of them rise into the air. For a moment it sou=
ght to
follow, but then chose to stay on the ground, =91there was more comf=
ort
on the ground.=92

<Crackle!! . . . BZZT!!>

The creature=92s shielding=
 failed again, revealing a powerfully built
mechanized lion. Its face, shou=
lders and part of the back legs were a
purple reminiscent of the Decepticon=
 of old, while the rest of its
body was a deeper darker purple flowing into=
 ebony black. It was
large, fully four feet or more at the shoulders, dark =
fangs protruded
slightly from its mouth while powerful shoulders sported wh=
at appeared
to be grenade launchers!

With a shake its head it leaped up on=
to fallen debris and . . .

<ROOAARR!!!>

The very air seemed to vibrate wi=
th the resonance of the decibels.
Wide optics looked around as his tailed s=
wished. It was as if it was
declaring itself king of all that it surveyed a=
s it looked down and
around.

From its chest still emitting a deep rumbling=
 growl.

OOC: Again there is no clear IFF signal. The creature registers as=

Cybertronian, but not as Predacon/Decepticon or Maximal/Autobot.
However t=
o Trelos the creature may/might (up to you) smell/detect
something like Myr=
midon, although he looks changed. There are no
markings or sigils anywhere =
depicting any factional affiliation. Oh,
and Myrmidon was thought to have b=
een killed during that last push
when Cyclonus was acting as a herald of Un=
icron and attacking the Ark.

Preston
